fields.description:
Any attempt to create a build using the es.smartaccess.cryptolibrary module (https://marketplace.appcelerator.com/apps/3515#!overview) fails.  Removing the library results in a successful build.

This library builds successfully in 3.3.GA and lower.

Build output attached.
fields.summary: Builds using SDK 3.4.0-RC and es.smartaccess.cryptolibrary fail

comments.body:
Hi,

The link you provided is not valid anymore. Marking this ticket as "Need more info"
